body: @qevinalx Simple, husband accepted the relationship with the guy with the glasses because he still loved her and wanted her to be happy (cuck), but she felt empty with the situation, since what she wanted was the thrill of betraying her husband (which is shown on the end)
Someone can explain the cuzukago history in this chapter please

What the hell did ion do? His work started out so wholesome and now it's turned to this? Even after the last and this chapter I'm still holding our for a good end. Please don't let the blonde milf get turned into a cum dumpster.
And the Cuzukago story goes out with a gigantic... "meh."
